rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {MKB146, MKC2300, MKF3301, MKT3301, MKW3301%, MKX3301}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MKF1120, MKF2111, MKP1120, MKS1120}
(Incompatible with course version in {B2003, B2012, B2013, B2018} and  Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MKC3110, MKC3140, MKF3121, MKF3131})
Must be enrolled in course type {09-4, 10, 41, 50}

proh: MKC3131, MKC3140, MKC3110, MKF3121, MKF3131. Students enrolled in courses B2003, B2013, B2012, B2018.
description: This unit emphasises the role of marketing decision making in contemporary organisations, with particular focus on the marketing planning role and the formulation of marketing strategies.
